Html:
Hello,

I have an WSUS Server 3.0 SP2 + Downstream Server (Modus Autonom)!
On the Downstream Server the ID field is yellow/orange marked - Why?

Is the certificate you use for code signing installed on the downstream server?

There's a similar sounding issue in this thread: https://wsuspackagepublisher.codeplex.com/discussions/459352
Also this one: https://wsuspackagepublisher.codeplex.com/discussions/573448
